level.text: Payment of any prize, including a POWERBALL®, Hot LottoTM, Sizzler or a prize awarded pursuant to Chapter 10 of this title, shall discharge the District of Columbia, the Agency, the Multi-State Lottery Association, and their members, product groups, officers, employees, agents and attorneys, representatives, and contractors of all liability for payment of the prize.
Payment of a prize to a duly authorized representative or fiduciary shall effect the full and complete discharge provided by §§611.1 and 611.2.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 7439, 7448 (October 2, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 43 DCR 5110, 5113 (September 20, 1996), 50 DCR 8816 (October 17, 2003), 53 DCR 295 (January 13, 2006), 55 DCR 6370 (June 6, 2008).

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992. the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
